section.heading: Single military personnel management system

content.p: Members of the Space Force shall be managed through a single military personnel management system, without component.

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 118–31, div. A, title XVII, § 1711, Dec. 22, 2023, 137 Stat. 625.)

section.heading: Members: duty status
section.chapeau: Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary of the Air Force, each member of the Space Force shall be placed in one of the following duty statuses:
section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 118–31, div. A, title XVII, § 1714, Dec. 22, 2023, 137 Stat. 626.)

section.heading: Members: minimum service requirement as applied to Space Force

subsection.heading: Inapplicability of Active/reserve Service Distinction.—
subsection.content: In applying section 651 of this title to a person who becomes a member of the Space Force, the provisions of the second sentence of subsection (a) and of subsection (b) of that section (relating to service in a reserve component) are inapplicable.

subsection.heading: Treatment Upon Transfer Out of Space Force.—
subsection.content: A member of the Space Force who transfers to one of the other armed forces before completing the service required by subsection (a) of section 651 of this title shall upon such transfer be subject to section 651 of this title in the same manner as if such member had initially entered the armed force to which the member transfers.

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 118–31, div. A, title XVII, § 1714, Dec. 22, 2023, 137 Stat. 626.)
